desc:
Please add the ability to "tag" documents. Basically, you have the option to add keywords to a document to later easily group them together. So, naturally you need a place to search by keywords or include it in normal search. That way clients can categorize documents even if they are in different safety zones.

If they for example give a document a tag called "FICA" they can later on find all documents related to "FICA".
name: VW - Tags
